name: Rockin Pairs Memory Game
description:
Play a variety of pairs memory games.

Turning over two cards at a time to find a matching set to progress.

Starting off easy with six cards building to level five with twenty eight cards.

As you learn each deck the less turns you take and the faster you become.

Gain stars for matching in the fewest turns.

  • Game types include matching pairs of objects like candy, transport, dice and dominoes.
  • Improve your math(s) by matching maths equations with answers.
  • Learn some world flags with three game types to expand your knowledge and memory.

Six game types are free to play in the browser version.

Buy and download here to open up all the collections with over 30 game types to play.

For achievements and high scores tables get the Android version on the Google Play store where the collections are available individually.

This game was created in 2016/17 and originally released on Google Play for Android. It has been tweaked a liitle to be realeased here in 2020 as an online and downloadable version.

Enjoy.
